alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:42AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Madison, Franklin, eastern Crawford, northeastern Sebastian and southeastern Washington Counties through 915 AM CST... At 841 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles east of Drake Field Airport to near Fern to 4 miles south of Mansfield. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Ozark... Charleston... Huntsville... Elkins... West Fork... Mulberry... Altus... Winslow... Branch... Denning... St. Paul... Hindsville... Wiederkehr Village... Wesley... Saint Paul... Forum... Aurora... Withrow Springs State Park... Bloomer... This includes Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 20 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
